section.title: Downloads and Releases
section.p: Information on Lucene Java Downloads and Releases.

section.title: Official Release
section.p: Official releases are usually created when the developers feel there are sufficient changes, improvements and bug fixes to warrant a release. Due to the voluntary nature of Lucene, no releases are scheduled in advance.
Both binary and source releases are available for download from the Apache Mirrors

section.title: Nightly Build Download
section.p: Nightly builds are based on the trunk version of the code checked into SVN

section.title: Source Code
section.p: Subversion The sourcefiles are now stored using Subversion (see http://subversion.tigris.org/ and http://svnbook.red-bean.com/)
